purpose: Provide sample applications and examples to demonstrate the integration of Apache Dubbo with Go for microservices development
principle: Utilizes Apache Dubbo, a high-performance, Java-based RPC framework, adapted for Go to enable cross-language service communication
reusability: Offers reusable sample code and configurations to facilitate the integration of Dubbo in Go projects, suitable for developers looking to implement microservices architecture
limitations: Primarily focused on Go and Dubbo integration, may not cover all edge cases or advanced Dubbo features
name: dubbo-go-samples
highlight: Comprehensive examples for integrating Apache Dubbo with Go applications
